skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 35% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. Each hit also has a 35% chance of stealing 30% of the target’s current Turn Meter.
Attacks 1 enemy. Has an 85% chance of placing a [Block Cooldown Skills] debuff for 4 turns. Also has a 35% chance of placing a [Block Cooldown Skills] debuff on all other enemies for 1 turn.

Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. Has a 25% chance of placing the [Stun] debuff for 2 turns instead and stealing 50% of the target’s current Turn Meter. Resets the cooldown of this Skill if the target is killed.

Places one of the following buffs on this Champion for 2 turns at the start of each turn: a 50% [Increase ATK] buff, a 30% [Increase C.DMG] buff, a 30% [Increase C.RATE] buff, a 25% [Strengthen] buff, or a [Block Damage] buff.
Increases Ally ATK in all Battles by 25%.
